Package com.camerontec.catalys.util.thread

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IManagedThreadCallbacks
    This interface is used by the ManagedThread and can be passed in the constructor of a ManagedThread.
    TimerTask
    Used by Timer to callback your object from an independent thread when the timer goes off.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ManagedThread
    This class manages the creation and destruction of threads.
    ManagedThreadHelper
    This is a simple wrapper class for thread that allows for a clean termination of the thread.
    MonitoredTaskController
    A MonitoredTaskController is both a task and a task controller.
    ThreadDumpUtils
    Utility methods to dump thread information for all JVM threads on request.
    Timer
    This class provides a thread which will trigger in a given number of milliseconds.
